item.title: Offensive battle leads to a Seahawks win, a berth to Super Bowl LX
item.description: Seattle defeats Los Angeles in the NFC Championship Game and advances to Super Bowl LX to face the Patriots.

item.title: The Patriots just showed us what it means to hire the right coach
item.description: New England just went from 4-13 in 2024 to the Super Bowl with Mike Vrabel.

item.title: Inside Sean Payton's fourth-down Patriots-Broncos call
item.description: Behind the scenes with Denver Broncos coach Sean Payton, before and after his failed fourth-down decision.

item.description: These five 2026 prospects are likely to have breakout college careers -- and they have precedent.
